Hi all.. talking about GIRO.. I've my hsbc ega giro for dbs credit cards approved yesterday.. my dbs cc payment due date is 20 may.. do u think the giro will take effect or I need to manually pay this month?
If u already receive the dbs statement before the approval  I don't think it will giro this mth.For my uob statement  it will state giro payment if that statement will be deduct via giro.
Ahh I see.. I will pay off my bill then
Will I be eligible if I had closed my webull account previously and re-open it for this campaign?
Ya dont risk it. Better pay now. Next month only giro
Is it worth while to convert SGD to USD for the mmf USD 5%?or mmf SGD 3.6%?any1 done the calculation is it worth the conversion?
Depends on your view on usd/sgd and also the fx spread applied.I would generally say don‚Äôt convert unless u have use for the foreign currency upon maturity.
Assuming you convert SGD to USD and convert USD back to SGD within 30 mins or less  how many % was loss in FX spread?
Anyone receive qualfied sms for hsbc everyday reward for the month of June 24?
True  for now I don't have use for USD. Just attracted to the high interest 5%.But for longer term like 6mth or so  if u constantly get the 5%  it should outweighs the fx spread?
But the April SMS covers until 31 May. So should be ok I guess?
What about expected usd depreciation if US cut interest rates
Not sure how many % the spread they charge you  but I know credit card charges 3.25% fx spread. You earn 5%/2= 2.5% in 6 month  then‚Ä¶..
Yeah. Cover only til May. Wonder if the promo continue to June and beyond?

There‚Äôs something that I want to clarify about this Altitude card. For local spend  you are awarded with 1.3mpd.The miles are awarded based on single transaction or the total amount of month end statement?If I paid $9.90 for a meal  I will be awarded 1 DBS point only?If my monthly statement is $99.90 for local send  I will be awarded 19 DBS points?Am I right or I‚Äôm missing out something?
You will earn 9.9√∑5x3.25 = 6 (round down) DBS points for $9.90 transaction when it posts. Minimum $1.54 local transaction for 1 DBS point.
